titles.title: To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 relating to contracts for Federal purchases of renewable energy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 12/9/2009--Introduced. Amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to allow a contract for the acquisition of renewable energy for the federal government to be made for a period of up to 30 years.
